name: General Workings Inc
description: Provider of an online streaming application designed to facilitate fun and feature packed gaming platform. The company's application is an all-in-one platform, enabling live streamers to engage with viewers, monetize their broadcasts, and grow their channels.
one_liner: Provider of an online streaming application designed to facilitate fun and feature packed gaming platform. The company's application is an all-in-one platform, enabling live streamers to engage with viewers, monetize their broadcasts, and grow their channels.
